Game.Name: Tokkyuu Shirei Solbrain (Japan)
Game.plot: Imagine packing the power of 100 strategic missiles in every punch. Imagine needing every single megaton just to hold your own against a cybernetic army of metallic monstrosities. That's the guts of SHATTERHAND, the game that redefines hand-to-hand combat in the 21st century... along with all the standards for single-player action games for the NES. Seven levels of programmed adventure - you choose the action! State-of-the-art graphics featuring 8-direction scrolling! 'Anti-gravity' levels force you to fight upside-down! Armed 'satellite robots' assist you in battle. No arms on Earth can withstand the power in your hands!
